text: Megamind is a 2010 animated, science fiction-comedy movie that was produced by DreamWorks Animation and distributed by Paramount Pictures. The movie was directed by Tom McGrath. The movie premiered in Russia on October 28, 2010 and on November 5, 2010 in North America. The movie received mixed reviews from critics but it was positively welcomed from audience who praised its story, characters, humor, soundtrack, animation, emotional weight and message, even becoming an animated cult during the years. There was also various video games based on the movie released as tie-ins to the film. == Cast == * Will Ferrell as Megamind * Tina Fey as Roxanne Ritchi * Jonah Hill as Hal Stewart/Tighten *David Cross as Minion *Brad Pitt as Metro Man *Justin Long as Brainbots *J.
